summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2756, for the improvement of the alley between 11th Avenue South and 12th Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Massachusetts Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; by the necessary grading and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 32914 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
